--- Testing vfnmsub231sd (Fused Negative Multiply-Subtract of Scalar Double-Precision Floating-Point Values) ---
[Basic test]
Input a: 1.500000
Input b: 0.500000
Input c: 1.000000
Result: -1.750000
Expected: -1.750000

[Special values test]
Special a: 0x7ff0000000000000 0xfff0000000000000 0x7ff8000000000000 0x0000000000000000 
Special b: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
Special c: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
Special result: 0xfff0000000000000 0x7ff0000000000000 0x7ff8000000000000 0xbff0000000000000
